trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示支持在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 中水平滚动选项卡标题的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供按行的水平滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 定位其子元素所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 定位此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 中的子元素并设置其大小。

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示能否在水平轴上滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此 API。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供按行的水平滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此 API。

trans-unit.source: 0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供按行的水平滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中滚动内容的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中滚动内容的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>面板的值的内部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中滚动内容的水平偏移。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 可滚动内容的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>面板的值的内部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此 API。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供按行的水平滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one line.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向左滚动一行。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right by one line.
trans-unit.target: 将内容向右滚动一行。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此 API。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供按行的水平滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 要使其可见的对象。

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 标识要使其可见的坐标空间的边界矩形。

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 强制内容滚动，直至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 对象的坐标空间可见。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 可见的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 中的子元素，以便准备在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 传递中排列它们。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 所需的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel" /> 大小。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此 API。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此控件所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此控件所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在父类上设置此属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制和由这些子控件继承。

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用于访问上定义的视觉样式画笔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>类。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel.Ribbon" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个控制滚动行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 控制滚动行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The amount that content is horizontally offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 内容在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中包含视区的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
